page.title: 05REDLANDS FARM,EAST COKER
page.content:
{ Redlands Farm}is in the east of the area.There are four full time and two part time workers to share the work of both farms.
The farm is at an altitude of about {175_200ft.}and the slopes are fairly gentle or level.The{soil}is{red loam (hence the name)and{sandy loam, lighter soil than Westfield Farm.
The{crops}grown are oats,barley,grass and root crops and vegetables.Some of this feeds the{75 Friesian}cows.The cows give about{5000 litres}per cow per year.The milking parlour is an eight abreast parlour.
Together the two farms make the most efficient use of the land available.
